key.name: legacy-migration-complete
key.description: Set internally to true to indicate that TeleGNOME has checked for legacy gnome-config settings and migrated any that existed.

key.name: channel-children
key.description: List of channel IDs. Each channel folder uses the org.gnome.telegnome.channel schema.

key.name: zoom-factor
key.description: Page zoom factor. Larger numbers produce larger text.

key.name: paging-enabled
key.summary: Automatically switch page at periodic intervals
key.description: The frequency of paging is controlled by the "interval" key.

key.name: paging-interval
key.description: Specifies the interval for the auto-pager, in milliseconds.

key.name: page-url
key.description: URL pattern for pages. Must contain one C format string substitution accepting an int (e.g. %d), for the page number.

key.name: subpage-url
key.description: URL pattern for subpages. Must contain two C format string substitution accepting ints (e.g. %d), for the page and subpage numbers respectively.
